# Resources
Welcome to the resources section of the readme. Here you will find all material used to aid my coding and any links for any code I have used directly.


## Sources - bootstrap 
- Navbar: https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.0/components/navs-tabs/ 

- Blockquotes: https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.0/content/typography/#blockquotes

- Ticket price alert: https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.0/components/alerts/

- Basic form structure: https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.0/forms/form-control/

- Checkbox & radio buttons: https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.0/forms/checks-radios/

- Jumbotron: https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.0/examples/jumbotron/

- Media query code from w3 Schools: https://www.w3schools.com/cssref/css3_pr_mediaquery.php
